summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary of a witness (name redacted) conducted telephonically on April 10, 2020. The witness alleges she was manipulated, threatened, and sexually abused by Leon Black, who she claims ran a sex trafficking ring and had connections to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, Prince Andrew, and Harvey Weinstein. The document details forced sexual encounters, threats, financial transactions, and the witness's eventual signing of a non-disclosure agreement.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Allegedly manipulated, threatened, and sexually abused the witness, ran a sex trafficking ring, and forced her to sign a non-disclosure agreement. He claimed connections to law enforcement, Epstein, and Weinstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Leon Black flew the witness to Epstein's Florida home. Epstein allegedly wanted to have sex with the witness, and his associates pressured her, claiming he had a sex addiction.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The witness was introduced to Ghislaine Maxwell by Leon Black.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The witness was introduced to Prince Andrew by Leon Black.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Leon Black told the witness he was friends with Harvey Weinstein.

Black introduced the witness to Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: A witness alleges Leon Black ran a sex trafficking ring, manipulated her with drugs and threats, and sexually abused her over several years.
Leon Black allegedly flew the witness to Jeffrey Epstein's Florida home, where Epstein's associates pressured her to have sex with him, citing his 'sex addiction'.
The witness states she was forced to sign a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black in the fall of 2015.
Leon Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein in or around 2015.
The witness was introduced by Leon Black to several high-profile figures, including Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew.
